item.title: Front Matter
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Category:: #obsidian Tags:: #term #obsidian #tutorials Links:: 📇 Glossary Definition A set of YAML properties that can be included in any [Markdown] file to add extra information to a page

item.title: Information Rot
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Tags:: #term #knowledge-management #information-rot Category:: #concepts Links:: 📇 Glossary [Knowledge Management] Definition The process by which information degrades in quality over time without proper backup

item.title: System
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Category:: Concepts Tags:: #term #system #systems-thinking Links:: 📇 Glossary [Systems Thinking] [Knowledge Management] Definition a set of things working together as parts of a mechanism or an interconnecting network; a complex whole.

item.title: 🗃 Knowledge Management
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Tags:: #term #knowledge-management #obsidian Category:: #knowledge-systems Links: 📇 Glossary Definition Knowledge Management (KM) is the field of creating processes and places that individuals, teams and organisations can create, share and use information.

item.title: 🪨 Obsidian
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Category:: #obsidian Tags:: #term #obsidian #knowledge-management Links:: 📇 Glossary ![🖇 Attachments/obsidian-logo.png] Definition Obsidian is a naturally occurring volcanic glass formed when lava extruded from a volcano cools rapidly with minimal crystal growth.
